\dAll right, I got it!\d%K%P
\dHey Shion, you ready?\d%K%P
\dNice timing, Aki. I just finished.\d%K%P
I showed up in the kitchen just as Shion was\nturning off the stove.%K%P
\dAll I have to do is pack it into the bento box...\nVoila!\d%K%P
\dWell done. I'll carry it.\d%K%P
\dReally?\d%K%P
\dYou already have a lot to carry.\d%K%P
\dHehe, then go for it!\d%K%P
The bento box packed for multiple people\nturned out to be pretty heavy.%K%P
But knowing it was all food prepared by Shion,\nI didn't feel the weight at all.%K%P
\dWhoa, we're gonna be late!\d%K%P
\dThere's no need to rush, we can still make it.\d%K%P
\dYou sure? I don't want to make them wait.\nLet's hurry, Aki!\d%K%P
\dAll right.\d%K%P
\dI knew we'd end up rushing...\d%K%P
\dHehe. It's just a divine virtue of mine.\d%K%P
Carrying snacks and fruit in her arms, Shion\npuffed herself up with pride.%K%P
Ever since she cooked for the elderly that day,\nher reputation had skyrocketed.%K%P
We could barely step out of the house without\nbeing weighed down with little gifts and offerings.%K%P
\dLook, it's Mrs. Iwakura!\d%K%P
\dHello, Mrs. Iwakura.\d%K%P
\dWell hello there Akira, Shion.\d%K%P
Mrs. Iwakura greeted us with a hearty smile.%K%P
\dAre you two out on a date?\d%K%P
\dKinda, sorta... We're off to deliver my cooking\nto Mr. Shirane and the others.\d%K%P
\dMr. Shirane's, is it? Your cooking is sure to\nmake them weep with joy!\d%K%P
After chatting with Mrs. Iwakura, we rushed on\nto Mr. Shirane's house.%K%P
\dHey, Aki.\d%K%P
\dI finally realize how everyone here values me.\d%K%P
\dOf course. You're a Goddess of Kamimori.\nPlus, you're my companion and wife.\d%K%P
\dHeh-heh. That's right. I'm...so happy.\d%K%P
Shion smiled bashfully.%K%P
\dUp 'til now, I've wandered through many towns.\d%K%P
\dSince I'm a Goddess of Misfortune, I couldn't\nsettle for long. I avoided getting too involved\nwith people.\d%K%P
\dBut Kamimori was different.\d%K%P
\dI was able to change because I met you,\nKaede, Yukari, and everyone else in town.\d%K%P
\dYou're wrong.\d%K%P
\dYou're the one who wanted to change and worked\nso hard for it. You made it happen yourself.\d%K%P
\dWe all love you, Shion.\d%K%P
You can't just wait around for things to change.%K%P
Shion was able to grow so much because she\ntook action.%K%P
Witnessing her determination had only made us\nadmire Shion even more.%K%P
\dYup, I love you too Aki. And I love this town.\d%K%P
\dI'm even grateful that I'm a\nGoddess of Misfortune.\d%K%P
I was proud that this town had became a place\nShion could call home.%K%P
\dHey, Aki. Can I count on you to for an assist if\nI mess up, fail, or get depressed again?\d%K%P
\dYou can count on me. I'll help out even if you\nsay no.\d%K%P
\dI promised you, remember?\d%K%P
\dHehehe. That's right.\d%K%P
\dThen to express my gratitude as your mistress,\nI'll put even more effort into my nighttime duties,\nif you know what I mean.\d%K%P
\dWhere did that come from?\d%K%P
She totally ruined the innocent vibe.%K%P
\dBeing all serious gets tiring after a while.\d%K%P
\dYou're never gonna change, are you?\d%K%P
\dIt's all just part of my charm, right, Aki?\d%K%P
\dI'm Shion Misono, the Goddess of Misfortune, and\nyou're stuck with me!\d%K%P
